channel.description: Resources Slides Docker Tutorial for Beginners by TechWorld with Nana on YouTube Docker Overivew from Docker Container Report from Datadog GitHub Codespaces Overview from GitHub Virtual Machine-Based Features in Codio from Codio Video Transcript Up to this point, weâ€™ve been working with traditional virtual machines in our labs. To use a traditional virtual machine, we first install a hypervisor that allows us to run multiple VMs on a single system.
